alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, northwestern Palm Beach and southeastern Glades Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clewiston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Lake Harbor, Montura, Canal Point, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Devils Garden, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, Lake Hicpochee and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
